sentences.sentence: It was easy for her to sense his stupefaction.
sentences.translation: 那呆相是女人很容易清楚的。

sentences.sentence: Big horse play forward rolls stupefaction audience!
sentences.translation: 马大玩前滚翻惊呆观众！

sentences.sentence: Bear markets often end not in capitulation but stupefaction.
sentences.translation: 熊市的尽头往往是投资者的茫然麻木而非大举溃退。
